page.title: 10VILLAGE AMENITIES
page.content: Becky and myself interviewed an old resident in the village.She told us that the{friendliness}of the village hadn't really changed in the last forty years even though many new people had moved into the area.She felt that the newly built houses improved the village because new {amenities}had been built.There was now a Catholic Church, a village hall, a rifle range and a playing area for children with slides, climbing frames, swings and other apparatus.She talked about the new{Village Hall}that was built in 1981 thanks to the efforts of the villagers in{fund raising.}It consists of a main hall,two meeting rooms and a kitchen.In 1984 it was presented with a cup for the best kept village hall in Somerset.It has become the{centre of village life}with many activities eg. playschool,discos,etc.
